facebook.summary:
Apart from showing a playful VR-installation at the VIENNA DESIGN WEEK, we also presented 3 submissions at the IFIP ICEC 2016 conference 

Our papers:

- Bernhard Maurer, Michael Lankes, Barbara Stiglbauer, Manfred Tscheligi. EyeCo: Effects of Shared Gaze
